titles: Rycharde Rolle hermyte of Hampull in his contemplacyons of the drede and loue of god with other dyuerse tytles as it sheweth in his table.
Contemplations of the dread and love of God.
author: Rolle, Richard, of Hampole, 1290?-1349, attributed name.
publisher: In fletestrete in ye sygne of the sonne by wynkyn de worde,
notes: Not in fact by Richard Rolle.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Asceticism --  History --  Middle Ages, 600-1500 --  Early works to 1800.
